page.title: 10South Darley Village Hall
page.content: The Village Hall cost two thousand one hundred pounds.It was built in nineteen fifty two.There are pictures of the day it was opened.Mr.J.Hadfield opened the Village Hall.There was a carnival and everybody dressed up as silly royal people.There were quite a lot of people there.The school use it for gym and plays.The magic shows are put on in the Village Hall and road safety shows.For the little children they use it as a playschool with little trikes with three wheels.The parish council have meetings every month at the Village Hall.The Sunday school have jumble sales there.For the adults they have horticultural shows and heavy metal bands.There have birthday parties there as well.There is a bell piano.There is a corridor like kitchen.In the ceiling there is a hatch storing P.E stuff.
